remedies.name: Donation Practice
remedies.description: This traditional practice is traditionally used to help address imbalances or challenges in areas related to relationship. It may help create a sense of balance and correction. The effectiveness of this practice may vary based on individual circumstances and chart context.
remedies.safety_notes: This is a traditional practice. Please consult with a qualified practitioner if you have any concerns.
